website_summaries.verdict: A great fit for those with an army of power tools.
pros: Known to hold its own, staying charged for a complete yard makeover from edging to leaf blowing
Works effectively with 18 volt BLACK+DECKER products
cons: In the event your battery doesn't meet expectations, a great customer service team is standing by

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last as long as original
customer_reviews.text: First, I don't use my cordless drills a whole lot. But when I do have a big project I do make sure I have two charged batteries. I have two other cordless drills that last several times longer under the same loads, both having only a single battery. So this drill is used only for the screwdriver that needs the least power. So it does work. If you only need it for a couple minutes you'll never know. But if it's a week long project several hours a day you won't be happy.
customer_reviews.author: George Kibby

customer_reviews.title: Great lower-cost alternative that gives better performance than stock.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a Powerextra battery for our Roomba which is holding a charge much better than the $90 factory 'Extended Life' battery and I've used them for my Craftsman Drill. So, it was a natural thing to purchase them for my weed eater as well. I gotta' say that these work MUCH better than the stock Black & Decker batteries. They will easily last another 30% longer than the stock batteries especially in the blower (which was always a battery hog). The batteries do fit tight in the trimmer, but not too bad (other reviews stated this). Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: They fit and works like the originals
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I don't like about these. When they arrived, I plugged them into my charger. The next day, I tried my drill using the new batteries. It worked! About a month later, one of the guys used the drill and the battery was still charged and the drill ran fine. I would say that these are worth the money to breathe new life into your tools.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: a charge lasts about twice as long as the original ...
customer_reviews.text: a charge lasts about twice as long as the original equipment! we'll see how long they last before they stop taking a charge. the b&d only last about 12 months. you do have to use 3 arms or 2 arms and 2 legs to get them out of the tools.
customer_reviews.author: Tek2000

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of these batteries. They were half the price of the name brand versions so I did not have high hopes. So far, they are just as powerful as the originals and last just as long. My dad has one with the original battery and I have one with the new battery and we used them at the same time. Mine actually lasted a little longer than his. I imagine it was due to being new and his was not.
customer_reviews.author: John Calchera

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these extra batteries for my blower. I have the original battery and these batteries work far better. They are slightly more powerful and they last a lot, lot longer than my Black & Decker battery. In this case I'm glad I didn't spend the extra money on the name brand.
customer_reviews.author: B. Denise

customer_reviews.title: These batteries are perfect replacements for my OEM batteries that I use on ...
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are perfect replacements for my OEM batteries that I use on our weed trimmer. The old batteries had worn out and would not hold a charge well. These make the trimmer perform just like it was out of the box. I am very satisfied with the price, service and delivery of these items and they came in a (2) pack, which gives me a back-up battery. Now my wife never has to wait to trim the grass!
customer_reviews.author: Toadman

customer_reviews.title: BOTH won't hold a charge?!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just had bad luck, but I ordered two, and neither will last more than a few minute son my B&D Pole Saw. I have the original from many years ago that does as well, and when it was new, would last for at least 20 minutes! Cutting through much tougher material (palm tree fonds). I'll try to return and/or exchange and will update as appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: A Good Lower Cost B&D Single Source Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing these batteries I did have a concern that my B&D Single Source has only 2 blade contact's, the Powerextra has 3 blade contact's. I just received the two batteries and tried each one in my Black and Decker Alligator chain saw. They both fit and locked in place properly and powered up. There is no problem they fit fine and work. I still need to see how long they will hold a charge. So far I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Buy name brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas, so he's had them for about 4 months now and, when charged, last for about 5 minutes of use. The fit into the drill is a little tricky so I would not say it is a direct fit (even though our drill is listed as compatible). In hind sight I would've gotten either a new drill or batteries direct from the manufacturer. **Update** The company contacted me and gave me an exchange with new batteries. We're breaking them in as I type this.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline C

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I have actually been pleased with these batteries. They do NOT hold a charge as long as the original batteries, but I have recharged them a number of times, and they are dependable and don't seem to be deteriorating rapidly. For the price, I think they represent a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: RLF

customer_reviews.title: Incompatible with Black & Decker NST2118 trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was great. However, this battery would not click in to my Black and Decker Grass Hog trimmer/edger (NST2118) despite being listed on the compatible product list. If I hold it in place then it works but it falls out when I let go. Interestingly enough, it works fine on the leaf blower (the trimmer and blower were purchased as a combo unit and have shared the same 3 original batteries for years).
customer_reviews.author: C. Spurgeon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with one of the batteries holding a charge. Powerextra replaced it without question and delay. Extremely fast service. Very satisfied and will definitely buy again when needed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: very good deal- good product, good price fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and excellent customer service. they send expandable knit gloves with each battery. Price is lower than others, batteries have more power than original B&D ones. Ship partially charged. Faster delivery than Amazon indicates, much faster- three days.It takes a couple of charging cycles to reach maximum charging level.
customer_reviews.author: quick23

customer_reviews.title: Received in good condition. Charged them and went right to work
customer_reviews.text: Received in good condition. Charged them and went right to work. They seem to hold a better charge them the old ones that came with the weed eater. Very pleased. Good product! My old batteries had two prong and these have a three prong but work just fine. Made for both types of weed eaters.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Choice
customer_reviews.text: This battery fit perfectly in my Black & Decker grass trimmer. They charged with no problem using the BD charger. They seem to have a longer life when using the trimmer. How can you go wrong with a 2 unit price that is less than the price for 1 BD battery.
customer_reviews.author: Slickdome

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bad product, worked for like a month, right up until the be able to return by date. Then both shot craps
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Power Extra and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These batteries came quickly and work better than the originals. I charged them up and used one of them in my weed eater and couldn't believe how long the battery power lasted compared to what I was used to with the originals. I had even gone to the store and bought two new Black and Decker batteries to replace the ones that came with my tools and those were disappointing but these Powerextra batteries certainly do live up to their name and have extra power. I am very happy with them and now am much happier with my other B&D power tools.
customer_reviews.author: PMPT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shape. Runs very well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Excellent shape. They Run very well. Works excellently with our original Black and Decker trimmer. We are very happy with these two new batteries. They are very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Powerextra 2 Pack Black & Decker 18V 2000mAh Replacement Battery
customer_reviews.text: They don't hold a charge long! I would suggest spend the money on the name brand batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Preformed as good as the OEM battery.
customer_reviews.text: These batteries lasted longer then the B&D OEM battery at half the price! Took longer to charge but that probably factored into the longer time they lasted. One battery handled my entire yard in my weedwacker and that was never the case with the stock batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Sisco

customer_reviews.title: Battery Pack
customer_reviews.text: Works fine in my B&D grass whip. Much more affordable than I can find locally.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: They hold a chargeI
customer_reviews.text: I think they're better than the original ones - they seem to last longer before needing to be recharged
customer_reviews.author: Susan Grace

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: So far great deal and they worked fine on my Firestorm products. I wish Black and Decker put an auto shut off on their chargers so if they makers of these batteries make a newer charger with auto shut off that would be great: oh well. I had no problems with binding or locking into units. Very happy so far, and recommend highly. Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: These are great batteries that also fit
customer_reviews.text: These are great batteries that also fit ! I have gotten other brands that are suppose to work but always fall out!! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Too early for final assessment
customer_reviews.text: Units have not yet been put to test for longevity. Thus far, they have accepted a 'charge' and provide sufficient power to drive my Black and Decker tools as advertised. Heavy duty usage will be delayed until later in 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Notsag

customer_reviews.title: Replacement as good as the original.
customer_reviews.text: Charged them up and they worked perfectly. Slid right in to three of my 18 Volt Black &Decker yard tools. I can't give them a 5 since I don't know their life span yet. They seem very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Good capacity, no problems
customer_reviews.text: The varieties that came with our pet tools have dood and no longer hips a charge, these are replacements. These batteries hold a charge will and preform as expected they ate just as good as the ones grin the manufacturer, but much less expensive
customer_reviews.author: MattTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Better than originals
customer_reviews.text: The batteries fit perfectly and are a higher mAh than the original ones. There were also two complimentary gifts, love those freebies. I do recommend Powerextra products.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was within just a day or two, and I didn't expedite it. The batteries themselves are excellent. This is the second set I have bought (we have lots of battery-powered things), and both sets have been very good. They do just as well as the original equipment or maybe even better.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Took charge just like manufacturers. Works same
customer_reviews.text: just what i needed to keep my older lawn maintenance tools active. Took charge just like manufacturers. Works same.
customer_reviews.author: kcneeds

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with my 18V Black&Decker drill.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit the 18V Black and Decker battery operated drill. It did not replace the prior battery packs I had for this drill even though the B&D batteries were listed in the batteries these batteries were supposed to replace. Returned to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Baltimore fan

customer_reviews.title: Reliability/longevity
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Initially had problem with batteries locking into my B&D power tools; weed eater, blower. After a few tries and some extra push they would finally locked. However when using the B&D weed eater the battery would come out of the locked position. Reliability/longevity will take longer to evaluate, cutting season is over in my area.
customer_reviews.author: Impalajim58

customer_reviews.title: they are working as well as the branded batteries and the price was so much better!
customer_reviews.text: So far, they are working as well as the branded batteries and the price was so much better!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good replacements.
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been good replacements at a fraction of the cost. They hold a good charge.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the two rechargeable batteries for my Black & ...
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the two rechargeable batteries for my Black & Decker string trimmer which I have had for several years. The original batteries finally reached a point where they would not hold a recharge for long. The new ones solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: grandma of two

customer_reviews.title: Great savings!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the opportunity to use both of these batteries and I am very pleased. I'm pretty sure they last longer than B&Ds. And a great savings!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: Hadn't realized how bad my trimmer's original batteries had gotten until I got these. Can trim and edge my entire lawn on one charge. I think these might be better than my OEM B&D batteries ever were.
customer_reviews.author: bubba

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement batteries
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for the worn out batteries on my Black and Decker Grasshog cordless weed eater. In fact, I think these work better than the original ones when they were new, and they are sure a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Sosebee

customer_reviews.title: but they are very happy with the product and wouldn't hesitate to buy again
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a replacement for family members, but they are very happy with the product and wouldn't hesitate to buy again. They saved money and it works just the original batteries did.
customer_reviews.author: NLewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Batteries
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old Black and Decker batteries. They work great. The price is also very good. The shipping was quick and if I need any more then I know where to buy them. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Q. Caserta

customer_reviews.title: cheap and still working a year later
customer_reviews.text: bought these about a year ago. they get lite use. don't last super long, but for the price, they're good. still working good
customer_reviews.author: BassMasterBass

customer_reviews.title: PowerextraTM 2 Pack Black & Decker 18V...Review
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and how much I saved over purchasing the Black & Decker branded batteries. The first one I used was hard to get locked in to the weed eater but learned how to do it after a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Johnie Wood

customer_reviews.title: I've had one pair for one year and looks good so ordered a second pair
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be an improvement over the B & D originals. I've had one pair for one year and looks good so ordered a second pair. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: John Rich

customer_reviews.title: They now act better than new
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe what a difference these new batteries made in my yard products! They now act better than new!
customer_reviews.author: Beachmom17

customer_reviews.title: Fit too tightly
customer_reviews.text: Keep a charge longer than the batteries that came with my garden tools. However, they fit tightly and are difficult to install and remove
customer_reviews.author: texaschick

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine last season although did not fit as securely as ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased last July (2015). Worked fine last season although did not fit as securely as original B&D battery. Would not hold charge for very long in second season, but vendor promptly replaced defective units.
customer_reviews.author: patchover

customer_reviews.title: Powerextra 2 Pack Black & Decker 18V... Battery
customer_reviews.text: Great item, came charged and ready to use. Fits charger and tools like it should. Will buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I received these two batteries in a timely fashion. So far, they've exceeded my expectations -- offering longer battery life than the previous models.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Dean

customer_reviews.title: A Far Better Deal Than The Black & Decker Batteries
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are superior to the Black & Decker brand. They are more powerful and last longer. Throw in the fact they are noticeably cheaper (I bought the two pack) and they are a far better deal.
customer_reviews.author: shrinkucci

customer_reviews.title: These batteries are so much better than the one that came with my hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are so much better than the one that came with my hedge trimmer. The charge lasts a lot longer - more than 3x as long and the power from the battery is much stronger which makes the hedge trimmer work a lot better. The battery also stays in the trimmer pretty well. Once in a while I have to push it back in but all in all, a great buy and a way to keep that trimmer working much longer.
customer_reviews.author: karen l. horton

customer_reviews.title: They Worked!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. A bit early for me to comment on durability, but they charged right up and returned my drill to its original performance. And they are way cheaper then Black & Decker OEM replacements.
customer_reviews.author: sk123

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and performance
customer_reviews.text: The batteries fit my B&D Leaf blower perfectly. I charged them when they arrived and have used them several times since then. The price for the pair of batteries was good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these batteries 6 months ago. I had an issue with holding a charge, however the company sent me replacements that work great. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Breathed new life to my grass trimmer. Awesome power in these new packs. Fast shipping great company.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Batteries - Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My hamburger-powered lawn mower and edge trimmer (my son) has used these batteries on a handful of occasions and told me not to by OEM Black and Decker batteries anymore. These are batteries are much better than EOM B&Ds.
customer_reviews.author: SilverSurfer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered as promised. I charged them for the specified time before first use and they ran my power edger for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Wadas

customer_reviews.title: Each battery runs the B&D weed whip for less than ...
customer_reviews.text: Each battery runs the B&D weed whip for less than 7 minutes. They turned the weed whip and my drill into "LIGHT duty" tools.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Longer lasting!
customer_reviews.text: These batteries hold a charge longer than the black and Decker batteries that came with the trimmer. We are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Marie B. Diegelman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for Black & Decker battery and also seem to hold charge for a longer time period.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Both batteries fit nicely in all of my B&D tools
customer_reviews.text: Batteries replaced my FSB18's. Both batteries fit nicely in all of my B&D tools. Comes with three charging posts (for fast-charging), and the amount of power is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Runs like new and they hold a charge well
customer_reviews.text: Breathed new life into my Black and Decker blower. Runs like new and they hold a charge well.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood Alko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quick and does not hold a charge very long. I have to recharge the battery every time i need to use it., even when it has been sitting and not used since the last charge.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: These batteries are strong and last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: These batteries take quite a bit of work before they wear down. Gotta love that!
customer_reviews.author: alystar mckenneh

customer_reviews.title: Much less expensive than the B&D and work great.
customer_reviews.text: These work so much better than my old ones. They didn't fit the weed eater, until I filed the catch back a little bit, as suggested here by someone else. Then they clicked on just fine. Thank you to whoever it was that suggested filing them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replacing my old ones charged good and held the charge
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Milevoi

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Work great so far. A little tricky to get them to hook in place but when they are they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Corey A. Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Does't seem like it holds a charge as long as I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Maranhao

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: Only had them a short while, but they seem to have more power than originals and they fit without any modifications. Work with the old charger and pins are not a problem. Good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit and don't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: These batteries don't fit my string trimmer properly - they slide into the slot just fine but they don't latch in so they just fall out. I've been using a strip of duct tape to hold them in place but I'm tired of that. After a couple of months of using them, they hold less charge than my 3-year old batteries that originally came with the trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: blanesau

customer_reviews.title: Update to previous post-Awesome company customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Update-I had an extremely positive experience with customer service. They made sure my order was correct and did it quickly. The batteries work great. I recommend these batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Go Fish

customer_reviews.title: More lasting power
customer_reviews.text: The person who does my lawn really likes them. He used 4 of the orange ones to 2 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Sargent

customer_reviews.title: These batteries are just great. They fit all my products
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are just great. They fit all my products, vacuum and blower, without having to do any modification to the batteries like I did with other brands of this same model battery. They also last a lot longer than the originals or others I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ruble

customer_reviews.title: perfect replacement batteries for my B&D blower
customer_reviews.text: perfect replacement batteries for my B&D blower. Like other people have said, you need to work a little to get these out of the machine but they eventually wear in. They give a lot more power as well.
customer_reviews.author: TomF

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's the batteries or my edger, ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's the batteries or my edger, but these don't seem to last as long as my original B&D's.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: The old batteries finally gave up the ghost. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The old batteries finally gave up the ghost. I am very thankful that I was able to find replacement batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley H Jones

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not a perfect fit for the original B&D batteries. had to do some filing to make them release easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dwark Farkwar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far they are working very well time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Paul Homer

customer_reviews.title: These batteries are AWESOME! they came well package arrived on time - ...
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are AWESOME! they came well package arrived on time - and each battery came with a pair of white working gloves - that was an unexpected surprise - thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: John Schilling

customer_reviews.title: The batteries charged well and worked fine with Black & Decker hand vac
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dual battery pack several months ago. The batteries charged well and worked fine with Black & Decker hand vac, power drill and string trimmer. My only complain is that the battery did not latch well with the power tools. I had to use a bungee cord to keep it from sliding out. See the attached photo.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Duckdon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were cheap.I have many 18 volt tools and they work well with them
customer_reviews.author: dennis sibson

customer_reviews.title: Great batterys
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, they are just as good as the OEM black and deckers, and work well with the existing chargers. I'm not sure why anyone would pay for the OEM's when these are available.
customer_reviews.author: T. Parikh

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy these again
customer_reviews.text: Great batteries, hold charge well. They are just a little tight sliding them in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Page

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for the Black and Decker original equipment. Charged using both the standard charger and the rapid charger.
customer_reviews.author: D. Newlander

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement Firestorm batteries
customer_reviews.text: Works fine with my set of Firestorm tools and it seems to hold a lot of charge. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: K Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: good batteries for B&D 18 volt tools
customer_reviews.text: These are a good fit for 18 volt black and decker weed hog Batteries charge welll and last well
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: These are simply "OK" batteries. I use them with a B&D string trimmer and blower. When recharged, they output well, but when using, they only last about 1/3 to 1/4 as long as the equivalent Black & Decker batteries... I will not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: John Alexander

customer_reviews.title: They do not hold a charge like promised in the description.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these batteries! They are junk! The charge lasts about 2 minutes. I am a vey dissatisfied customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Anglin

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: item was as described seems to work good, so far, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: bolton43

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: great service. Product as advertised, delivered when and as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As other reviews have noted, it doesn't fit in ...
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews have noted, it doesn't fit in all the B&D tools. In fact, it worked in only 1 out of 3. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very high charging capacity, last much longer than the factory Batts that came with my tool.
customer_reviews.author: Fireside Fly Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Neither battery holds a charge for more than a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: I had to return them because neither of the batteries would hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lemar

customer_reviews.title: but with a little work and some good lubrication can be used
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't quite fit, but with a little work and some good lubrication can be used. Good value vs. other choice.
customer_reviews.author: LLV

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize how much power was lost with old battery. New ones are great... I charged them both for 15 hours initially. have used the first one for quite while now, still has plenty of power. Waiting for battery to run down to recharge but hasn't happened yet.... Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Drewry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They definitely work, but I think they're a little weaker than my original batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement batteries for my old firestorm cordless tool set.
customer_reviews.author: Mob_Muscle

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: I use them for my gardening tools blower, edger, and hand drill.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: These work well. Fit my black and decker leaf ...
customer_reviews.text: These work well. Fit my black and decker leaf blower with no modifcations needed.
